title: Google\Cloud\NetworkManagement\V1\FirewallInfo
name: FirewallInfo
description:
For display only. Metadata associated with a VPC firewall rule, an implied VPC firewall rule, or a hierarchical firewall policy rule.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkmanagement.v1.FirewallInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: The display name of the VPC firewall rule. This field is not applicable to hierarchical firewall policy rules.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: The URI of the VPC firewall rule. This field is not applicable to implied firewall rules or hierarchical firewall policy rules.

params.name: data.direction
params.description: Possible values: INGRESS, EGRESS

params.name: data.action
params.description: Possible values: ALLOW, DENY

params.name: data.priority
params.description: The priority of the firewall rule.

params.name: data.network_uri
params.description: The URI of the VPC network that the firewall rule is associated with. This field is not applicable to hierarchical firewall policy rules.

params.name: data.target_tags
params.description: The target tags defined by the VPC firewall rule. This field is not applicable to hierarchical firewall policy rules.

params.name: data.target_service_accounts
params.description: The target service accounts specified by the firewall rule.

params.name: data.policy
params.description: The hierarchical firewall policy that this rule is associated with. This field is not applicable to VPC firewall rules.

params.name: data.firewall_rule_type
params.description: The firewall rule's type.
